SEARCH:
Package com.icx.dom.jdbc

Klasse ConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
com.icx.common.base.Common
com.icx.dom.jdbc.ConnectionPool
public class ConnectionPool extends Common
JDBC database Connection pool.

Manages pooled database connections for given database connection string, user and password independently of database type. Connection pool contains already opened database connections which then will be (re)used by following connection requests.

ConnectionPool object can be created using ConnectionPool(Properties) from Properties object containing dbConnectionString, dbUser, dbPassword properties or directly using ConnectionPool(String, String, String, int).

At maximum poolSize open connections are kept in pool and reused on connection requests using getConnection(). If # of open connections in pool equals pool size additional connections will be closed physically on returnConnection(Connection) and will to be reopened on further connection request. If pool size is UNLIMITED (recommended) connections generally won't be closed physically before closing pool (which also means # of open connections in pool equals maximum # of connections used at the same time in the past). Pool size == 0 disables pooling function: every connection requested is immediately closed physically on returnConnection(Connection), so no unused connections stay open and a new physical database connection will automatically be opened for any connection request (performance!).

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ConnectionPool

      public ConnectionPool(String dbConnectionString, String dbUser, String dbPassword, int poolSize) throws ConfigException
      Constructor from database parameters.
      Parameter:
      dbConnectionString - database connection string (e.g.: "jdbc:sqlserver://localhost;instanceName=MyInstance;databaseName=MyDb", "jdbc:oracle:thin:@//localhost:1521/xe")
      dbUser - database user or null
      dbPassword - password or null
      poolSize - maximum # of open connections kept in connection pool, -1 for unlimited number of connections
      Löst aus:
      ConfigException - if connection string is null or empty

    • ConnectionPool

      public ConnectionPool(Properties databaseProperties) throws ConfigException
      Constructor from properties object with database properties.
      Parameter:
      databaseProperties - Properties object which must contain the following properties: dbConnectionString, dbUser, dbPassword and can optionally contain poolSize (defaults to UNLIMITED).
      Löst aus:
      ConfigException - if connection string is null or empty

  • Methodendetails

    • close

      public void close() throws SQLException
      Close database connection pool and all open database connections.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - on database error

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      Get a pooled database connection for given credentials.
      Gibt zurück:
      open database connection
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - on database (access) error

    • returnConnection

      public void returnConnection(Connection cn)
      Close pooled database connection.

      If pool size = 0 or # of open connections in pool = pool size closes connection physically, otherwise leaves connection open and returns it to pool.

      Parameter:
      cn - database connection to close
